com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib

Class LowPassFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.LowPassFilter

  • public class LowPassFilter
extends Object
    Provides methods to apply a low pass filter to a single value or to a set of values.
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected LowPassFilter()
      Hidden constructor, to prevent instantiating.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float filterValue(float previousValue, float newValue, float alpha)
      Implements a low pass filter, topping of high frequency changes, reducing the jumpiness of the signal.
      static float[] filterValueSet(float[] previousArray, float[] newArray, float alpha)
      Runs a low pass filter on an array of unrelated values in parallel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LowPassFilter

        protected LowPassFilter()
        Hidden constructor, to prevent instantiating.

    • Method Detail

      • filterValue

        public static float filterValue(float previousValue,
                float newValue,
                float alpha)
        Implements a low pass filter, topping of high frequency changes, reducing the jumpiness of the signal.
        Parameters:
        previousValue - previous sensor value
        newValue - new sensor value
        alpha - Alpha value of low pass filter (valid range : 0-1)
        Returns:
        filtered value

      • filterValueSet

        public static float[] filterValueSet(float[] previousArray,
                     float[] newArray,
                     float alpha)
        Runs a low pass filter on an array of unrelated values in parallel. There is no relation between the values, this method passes a set of separate signals in parallel. Not be confused by an array of values from the same sensor (FIFO), where the result of passing each value in an array is influenced by the result of the previous value.
        Parameters:
        previousArray - array of previous values
        newArray - array of current values
        alpha - Alpha value of low pass filter (valid range : 0-1)
        Returns:
        array with filtered values.
